2011960.name: Sunny Grove
2011960.description:
Penny's little ones are lost deep in the mysterious forest, and it's up to you to bring them back home, safe and sound! (Just make sure they're back before dinner!)

Explore the forest through all its seasons

Journey through a forest that transforms with the changing seasons. Each bringing new visual beauty and new foes determined to stand in your way.

Soar through the skies

Unfold your trusty glider and take a leap of faith! Glide between mountains, over rivers, or just enjoy the thrill of flight. And don't worry, Penny's children have gliders too, so they won't get left behind.

Uncover secrets and treasures

Search high and low for hidden fruits, unlock magical gates with color-coded keys, and uncover the forest's many secrets. Challenge hostile creatures to steal the fruits they guard for yourself!

Travel through the spirit realm to reveal hidden paths collectables.
2011960.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
